characters_info.name: Jake Sully
characters_info.description: A former Marine who became the Toruk Makto and leader of the Omatikaya clan.

characters_info.name: Neteyam
characters_info.description: The eldest son of Jake and Neytiri, a golden boy and a skilled warrior.

characters_info.name: Neitiry
characters_info.description: The fierce and noble Tsahìk-in-waiting of the Omatikaya clan and wife of Jake.

characters_info.name: Lo'ak
characters_info.description: The impulsive second son of Jake Sully who feels like an outcast.

characters_info.name: Kiri
characters_info.description: The adopted daughter of Jake and Neytiri with a unique spiritual connection to Eywa.

characters_info.name: Miles Quaritch
characters_info.description: A Recombinant soldier with the memories of the deceased Colonel Quaritch.

characters_info.name: Spider
characters_info.description: A human child born on Pandora who prefers the culture of the Na'vi.

characters_info.name: Tonowari
characters_info.description: The Olo'eyktan (leader) of the Metkayina reef clan.

characters_info.name: Ronal
characters_info.description: The Tsahìk of the Metkayina clan, a powerful and fierce healer.

characters_info.name: Tsireya
characters_info.description: The daughter of Tonowari, a gentle and graceful free-diver.

characters_info.name: Varang
characters_info.description: The leader of a volatile and aggressive clan of fire-dwelling Na'vi.

characters_info.name: Dr. Grace Augustine
characters_info.description: The legendary xenobotanist who ran the Avatar program to bridge two worlds.

characters_info.name: Tsu'tey
characters_info.description: Once the clan's finest warrior and the original betrothed of Neytiri.

characters_info.name: Ao'nung
characters_info.description: The son of Tonowari, a skilled hunter who initially clashed with the Sully family.

characters_info.name: Norman
characters_info.description: A scientist and friend of Jake who operates an Avatar to study Pandora.

characters_info.name: Rotxo
characters_info.description: The son of Tonowari, a skilled hunter who initially clashed with the Sully family.

characters_info.name: Lile Wainfleet
characters_info.description: A Recombinant soldier with the memories of the deceased Colonel Quaritch.

characters_info.name: Tarsem
characters_info.description: The Olo'eyktan (leader) of the Omaticaya clan.

characters_info.name: Mo'at
characters_info.description: The Tsahìk (Spiritual Leader) of the Omaticaya clan and mother of Neytiri. She acts as the interpreter of Eywa's will and maintains the spiritual balance of her people.
characters_info.weapon: Spiritual wisdom and ceremonial Na'vi dagger

characters_info.name: Peylak
characters_info.description: The leader of a nomadic merchant clan that travels across Pandora. They navigate the skies using giant jellyfish-like creatures, trading rare resources between different Na'vi tribes.
characters_info.weapon: Trade staff and paralyzing bolas inspired by air-jelly stingers
